Description.Text: The 3-star superior Eden Nord hotel offers a hillside location with fantastic views of the mountains open sea and the beach, approximately 150m away. The hotel offers comfortable accommodation, good transport links and high quality leisure facilities including two swimming pools and a gym. The hotel is situated amongst the hills of Port De Soller, overlooking the old fishing harbour. There are numerous activities nearby the hotel which include hiking, climbing and mountain biking. Waterside, day yacht hire is available alongside fishing, snorkelling and scuba diving equipment hire. There are also a variety of shops, bars and restaurants in the harbour area. The hotel is housed in a modern 6-storey building. Guests can use the hotel's outdoor swimming pool during the summer months, which includes a patio area with sun beds. During winter months the hotel opens a small indoor heated swimming pool. Guests can also use the hotel's gym, Jacuzzi, solarium and games/TV room. The hotel restaurant offers a variety of European and British dishes and a poolside bar with a wide selection of alcoholic beverages and soft drinks. Standard rooms are spacious and comfortable and include a balcony or terrace with views of the hotel swimming pool, mountains or port. Decorated in blue tones, rooms boast modern amenities including air-conditioning, a telephone and TV with satellite/cable channels. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.
